text: The Cabinet of Ministers yesterday (24th Oct.) approved a proposal to implement a program with immediate effect to make the public aware on the Local Authorities Election (Amendment) Act No. 16 of 2017.   The legal foundation of new election system has been prepared by this Act and public are unaware of these amendments yet.  The proposal was jointly made by Prime Minister and National Policies and Economic Affairs Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe, Provincial Councils and Local Government Minister Faizer Mustapha and Women and Child Affairs Minister Chandrani Bandara.
title: Awareness program for public on new election system
